verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> What <WH4100> is <WH1961> the vine <WH1612> tree <WH6086> more than any <WH4480> <WH3605> tree, <WH6086> or than a branch <WH2156> which <WH834> is <WH1961> among the trees <WH6086> of the forest? <WH3293>

Shall wood <WH6086> be taken <WH3947> thereof <WH4480> to do <WH6213> any work? <WH4399> or <WH518> will men take <WH3947> a pin <WH3489> of <WH4480> it to hang <WH8518> any <WH3605> vessel <WH3627> thereon? <WH5921>

Behold, <WH2009> it is cast <WH5414> into the fire <WH784> for fuel; <WH402> the fire <WH784> devoureth <WH398> <WH853> both <WH8147> the ends <WH7098> of it, and the midst <WH8432> of it is burned. <WH2787> Is it meet <WH6743> for any work? <WH4399>

Behold, <WH2009> when it was <WH1961> whole, <WH8549> it was meet <WH6213> for no <WH3808> work: <WH4399> how much less <WH637> shall it be meet <WH6213> yet <WH5750> for any work, <WH4399> when <WH3588> the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> it, and it is burned? <WH2787>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> As <WH834> the vine <WH1612> tree <WH6086> among the trees <WH6086> of the forest, <WH3293> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> to the fire <WH784> for fuel, <WH402> so <WH3651> will I give <WH5414> <WH853> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And I will set <WH5414> <WH853> my face <WH6440> against them; they shall go out <WH3318> from one fire, <WH784> and another fire <WH784> shall devour <WH398> them; and ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> when I set <WH7760> <WH853> my face <WH6440> against them.
And I will make <WH5414> <WH853> the land <WH776> desolate, <WH8077> because <WH3282> they have committed <WH4603> a trespass, <WH4604> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
